txt.en: You have buried all of the people of Lornost.
You have come upon a massacre in Lornost, and should now bury the dead.
You have buried all the folk of Lornost and restored their honour in death. The Heirs of Castamir command a brutal force and must be defeated if the people of Lebennin are to live free of fear.

Amidst the ruins of Lornost, you see many of its folk still lying where they fell. Many sustained brutal injuries before succumbing to the Corsair and Haradrim forces and none were granted any dignity in their final moments.\n\nPerhaps burying them in the place they once called home will restore their honour and grant them peace in death.

Slain Gondorians can be found throughout Lornost in eastern Lebennin.\n\nYou have discovered the grim aftermath of a slaughter in Lornost and should bury the people of the fallen settlement so that they may have some dignity in death.
The people of Lornost were ill-prepared for war against the Heirs of Castamir and granted no honour in death at their hands.
